text:
(Cocoon 2.1.7 / Lenya 1.2.x Rev. 165600 / default publication)

when switching from authoring to trash or archive (traversing the sitetree by
clicking the "+") one get's a double slash ("//") in the URL, when he finally
selects a node (a second click on the node adjusts the URL)

it's the same when switching from trash or archive to authoring

-> commands like Edit > rename URL remain active for such a "junk" URL, but lead
to errors
creator: michael.trindler@id.unizh.ch
michael.trindler@id.unizh.ch
text: it's working now (lenya 177945); somebody at wyona fixed this
